Trophy.Title: To The Heroes Among Us
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player finds the hidden Extra Life 2012 Logo.

Trophy.Title: A Carousel Of Broken Dreams
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player completes Act I.

Trophy.Title: A New Dimension
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player shifts for the first time.

Trophy.Title: The Cyclops' Bottle
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player finds the Cyclops' bottle in the Carousel area.

Trophy.Title: FIN
Trophy.Description: Unlocks when the player completes the game.

Trophy.Title: GroundsKeeper
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player discovers all collectibles in Act II.

Trophy.Title: Handy Person
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player repairs the three attractions.

Trophy.Title: How'd You Get In?
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player completes the Workshop.

Trophy.Title: Illuminated
Trophy.Description: Unlocked after the player gets their second luminary.

Trophy.Title: Just Like Harry
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player makes it over the crocodiles on their first attempt in the Shadow Theater.

Trophy.Title: Let There Be Light
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player completes the Lighthouse.

Trophy.Title: No Backpack Bird Needed
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player jumps into the treasure chest in the Pirate Ride.

Trophy.Title: Not That Kind Of Game!
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player tries to enter the “XXX” door.

Trophy.Title: Now That's Thinking With Shadows
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player clears the Void Jump on their first attempt.

Trophy.Title: My God, It's Full Of Stars!
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player falls into the void on the way to the Cinema.

Trophy.Title: Room 529
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player leaves the Cabaret.

Trophy.Title: Streets Sweeper
Trophy.Description: Unlocked after the player discovers all collectibles in Act I.

Trophy.Title: The Family Life
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player examines Didi's family pictures.

Trophy.Title: This Circus Is A Disaster!
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player goes through the circus tent toward the attractions.

Trophy.Title: You Broke My Finger!
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player leaves the Cinema.

Trophy.Title: BookKeeper
Trophy.Description: Unlocked when the player discovers all collectables in Act III.
